monogr.title: Drum Beats: Walt Whitman's Civil War Boy Lovers

revisionDesc.change: made basic checking changes to file

body.p: Your Letter & Picture & Paper came safe. I hope you will excuse me for not writing sooner I have been laid up with a pain in my back ever since tuesday last, but I am feeling better at this present time & hope to [be] able to go work tomorrow [morn]ing. I cantcan't find words to tell you how thankful I am for the Picture. I dontdon't think that I ever had a present that I think more of than I do it. I am agoing to have it framed if nothing happensI want that Picture to remain in my family as long as thierthere is a member of it living. I would like very much to see you & have a long talk with you & if nothing happens I want you to visit us soon as the Weather gets pleasanter. We are as comfortable as the most of poor people that has to labor for a living. this is a very plaesentpleasant place in the summer time when the trees are all out in full bearing.
I will stop hopeinghoping this may find you improving in health.. also

closer.salute: with much love & many thanks from myself & my Wife
